title: Apex NeoBank Platform
summary: A cloud-native banking platform that unified KYC, payments, and analytics for a fast-scaling digital bank serving 4 regions.
excerpt: Modernized the entire fintech stack with composable services, automated compliance workflows, and blazing-fast client onboarding.
heroDescription: We partnered with Apex Finance to design, build, and launch a modular banking core with automated compliance and real-time analytics.
highlights: Unified design system across web + mobile

challenge.title: Legacy stack blocking growth
challenge.description: Apex Finance faced a fragmented architecture and manual compliance reviews that limited expansion. The internal team needed a partner to deliver a new platform without disrupting active customers.
bullets: Manual onboarding queues created week-long delays
No single source of truth for customer identity
Infrastructure sprawl caused frequent downtime during releases

strategy.title: Composable banking core
strategy.description: We modernized the platform in parallel tracks—data, experience, and compliance—using a composable domain architecture and progressive migration plan.
bullets: Designed event-driven services for onboarding, compliance, and notifications
Implemented a shared design language across dashboard + client portal
Automated AML/KYC reviews with a risk rules engine backed by AI scoring

outcome.title: Launch without disruption
outcome.description: The new platform launched across four regions with zero downtime, empowering the internal team with observability and automated playbooks.
bullets: Cut manual reviews from 3 days to under 4 hours
Reduced release times from bi-weekly to on-demand
Enabled regulatory exports in minutes, not days

testimonial.quote: ZephorTech rebuilt our banking core while we stayed online. Their discipline around architecture and delivery gave us confidence to scale into new markets.
testimonial.author: Priya Natarajan

title: Velora Commerce Experience
summary: Unified B2C + B2B commerce channels with a headless storefront, AI merchandising, and a blazing-fast global CDN.
excerpt: Delivered a future-proof commerce stack with personalized storefronts, automated merchandising, and deep analytics.
heroDescription: Velora wanted a unified experience for retail buyers, wholesale partners, and marketing. We shipped a composable storefront powered by a CMS and AI product discovery.
highlights: Composable CMS powering campaigns + landing pages

metrics.label: Marketing ops
metrics.detail: Campaign launch time down from 2 days

challenge.title: Fragmented buyer journeys
challenge.description: Wholesale partners and direct consumers were maintained on different platforms with mismatched promotions and inventory visibility.
bullets: Marketing teams couldn't launch localized landing pages quickly
Merchandisers lacked tools to test bundles or promotions
Wholesale buyers used a legacy portal with no personalization

strategy.title: Composable commerce foundation
strategy.description: We separated content, commerce, and personalization so teams could move fast without engineering bottlenecks.
bullets: Headless storefront built with Next.js + commerce API
Strapi drives collections, campaigns, and editorial storytelling
AI-driven merchandising rules tuned for buyer personas

outcome.title: Measurable growth in 90 days
outcome.description: Velora now launches collections weekly while wholesale partners enjoy the same fast experience as consumers.
bullets: Global CDN + edge rendering for millisecond responses
Unified loyalty program across B2B/B2C
Embedded analytics revealing drop-offs per persona

testimonial.quote: The ZephorTech team gave us a modern commerce engine and taught our marketers how to own it. We now launch campaigns the same day ideas are approved.
testimonial.author: Lena Vogt

title: MedSync Care Collaboration
summary: Built a secure collaboration portal for clinicians, patients, and insurers with HIPAA-grade auditing and AI triage.
excerpt: Modernized care coordination with real-time messaging, workflow automation, and predictive discharge planning.
heroDescription: We partnered with MedSync Health to digitize the discharge and follow-up workflow across clinics, payers, and families.
highlights: Audit-ready event log for every action

challenge.title: Manual, error-prone coordination
challenge.description: Faxed discharge packets, phone calls, and spreadsheets made collaboration slow and risky. MedSync needed a digital system that satisfied compliance teams.
bullets: Clinics tracked tasks in spreadsheets with no audit trail
Patients lacked visibility into follow-up actions
Insurers rejected claims due to incomplete records

strategy.title: Secure workflow automation
strategy.description: We co-designed a HIPAA-ready architecture and introduced AI agents to summarize notes, flag missing documents, and prioritize outreach.
bullets: Encrypted messaging + document sharing with retention policies
Workflow engine generating discharge packets automatically
AI triage assistant highlighting risky cases using historical data

outcome.title: Delight clinicians, satisfy compliance
outcome.description: The platform now powers care collaboration across 180 clinics, with real-time insight for patients and payers.
bullets: Reduced re-admissions by surfacing at-risk patients sooner
Every action logged with user, device, and record metadata
APIs for EHR and payer integration launched in phase two

testimonial.quote: ZephorTech made care coordination intuitive without compromising security. Their AI triage agent feels like another member of the team.
testimonial.author: Dr. Melissa Hart

title: Orbit Analytics SaaS Suite
summary: Launched a self-serve analytics SaaS with collaborative dashboards, usage-based billing, and multi-tenant governance.
excerpt: Scaled Orbit from beta to 500+ paying teams with an enterprise-ready platform featuring real-time collaboration and secure workspaces.
heroDescription: Orbit Labs needed a partner to productionize their analytics prototype with enterprise authentication, billing, and observability.

challenge.title: Prototype stuck in beta
challenge.description: Orbit's internal team built brilliant analytics but lacked the platform plumbing for secure multi-tenant delivery, billing, and observability.
bullets: Manual workspace provisioning through scripts
No enterprise authentication or RBAC
Billing limited to flat monthly invoices

strategy.title: Production readiness sprint
strategy.description: We built a multi-tenant foundation, integrated usage-based billing, and layered in collaboration features to differentiate the product.
bullets: Isolated workspaces with automated provisioning + teardown
Stripe usage-based events powering invoices + alerts
Live collaboration using CRDT-powered timelines

outcome.title: Ready for hyper-growth
outcome.description: Orbit now operates a premium SaaS suite with enterprise security, billing controls, and proactive observability.
bullets: SOC2-ready logging and automated evidence collection
Feature flags + rollout framework for progressive delivery
Admin analytics showing adoption per workspace

testimonial.quote: We went from a fragile beta to a polished SaaS suite in under five months. ZephorTech treated reliability, billing, and UX as first-class citizens.
testimonial.author: Mateo Alvarez
